title: Creative Losers
itunes:author: ESPN, Bomani Jones
itunes:subtitle: The Right Time: Raiders-Chargers, Djokovic's appeal and more!
content:encoded:
Bomani Jones recaps the last weekend of the regular season in the NFL, including the wild ending to Raiders-Chargers and why overall results underscore the mediocrity of this season (1:00). Plus, Serbian tennis star Novak Djokovic wins an appeal to stay in Australia and compete in the Australian Open (15:30), an IYHH including artificially intelligent tractors (23:57) and your voicemails from that friend who always takes things a little “too far” (36:08).


IYHH Stories

  1. @gettinviggy sheds light on Virginia’s I-95’s storm gridlock that trapped a U.S. Senator: https://nyti.ms/3JUaVXn
  2. @willknight shares that a John Deere self-driving tractor has stirred debate: https://bit.ly/3fbKv52
  3. @mattsreynolds1 shares that gravity could solve clean energy’s one major drawback: https://bit.ly/3fbKwpC
